subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The New York Mets took a 6-5 lead in the 12th inning at Washington only to lose to the Nationals in the bottom half of the inning, courtesy of some errant relief pitching.
snippet: The New York Mets took a 6-5 lead in the 12th inning at Washington only to lose to the Nationals in the bottom half of the inning, courtesy of some errant relief pitching.
